name: Hoshizora e Kakaru Hashi AA
summary: The fandisk for Hoshikaka, containing after stories for the 6 heroines and another stories for new heroine Seira and subchars Senka and Yocchan. The new routes take place one year after Kazuma first came to Yamabiko city. Ui and Hina’s Valentine’s Day routes from the special patch will now be fully voiced, with episodes for other characters coming out too.
